扼.definition: to grip forcefully; to clutch at; to guard; to control; to hold

扼喉撫背.definition: lit. to strangle the front and press the back (idiom); fig. to occupy all key points (military)

扼守.definition: to hold a pass; to guard (a strategic location)

扼死.definition: to strangle; to throttle; to stifle (opinions)

扼腕.definition: to wring one's hands (literally wring one's wrists)

扼襟控咽.definition: to secure a stranglehold (idiom); fig. to hold a strategic pass
